reviews.review_text: Has nothing to do with the Atari classic other than the name. The name was just used to sell a sub-par game.

I really wish there were more games out there that played like the old panzer dragoon games. I enjoy playing this game, I use a xbox 360 controller and have had no issues at all. Its a fun game would recommend
